alert.note: Alert for Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 23 at 12:12AM CST until December 24 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 possible. * WHERE...Starr County. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
